show.subtitle: Dr. Jack Rasmus will focus on today’s continuing crisis in the U.S. and global economies.
show.title: alternativevisions

header.title: Comparing Obama and Romney Economic Programs

title: Comparing Obama and Romney Economic Programs
content:
Dr. Jack Rasmus introduces his new show, ALTERNATIVE VISIONS, and explains its focus and theme. <!--more--> The show then dives into the topic: ‘Comparing Obama and Romney Economic Programs’.
The similarities and differences between the two programs are discussed, based on Dr Rasmus’ forthcoming feature article in ‘Z’ magazine, by the same title.
Future show topics and guests are announced.
